General.Name: Soyea Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Soyea Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the electronic information products, science and technology industrial parks, commodity trade, and real estate development businesses in China and internationally. The company offers smart parking space guidance system, smart access control system, smart public rental comprehensive service management platform, smart information system integration services, commercial multimedia display systems, self-service terminal equipment, intelligent communication terminals, rental housing management and control project business platform, equipment management platform, smart access control upgrade and transformation solutions, and deployed smart access control system hosting solutions. It is also involved in construction, development, and operation of science and technology industrial parks businesses. In addition, the company's commodity trading business covers steel products, non-ferrous metals, air purifiers, and other electronic business products, as well as develops housing projects, serviced apartments, and office buildings. Further, it provides voluntary maintenance and consulting services for home appliances, such as TVs and set-top boxes. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
